title: I got an Arclight Vel'koz Skin Code. (Question)
body: Is the code useable in more than one zone? So for example i used it in NA. Is it useable in EU?

replies.body: Yes. I have seen people use the codes on different servers.
can i get code for EUNE pls my nickname is SuPattA

why no 

??

> [{quoted}](name=Besteau,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Nw3Qwf4m,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-09T02:53:24.843+0000)
>
> Is the code useable in more than one zone? So for example i used it in NA. Is it useable in EU?
can give me a code

Guys I still have the EU and OCE EUNE code for whoever wants it. Just quote this post with a screen shot of a winning vel'koz game timestamped on the 11th or 12th. First come first served. The code expires on the 13th. 
I will friend the winners. You must be online on the **12th of March**.
If i can get my boyfriends code from pax i will friend the second place winners and give them that one too.

Can you give me the code for EUNE please?
mihai.g.ioan@gmail.com
can i please get a code for oce? it would be very nice of you to do that
Sure thing. got a junk email that i can send the code to?
Besteau, do you have one not used on Brazil server yet?
Can i get a code for EU??
can I also get one for a friend of mine? email: willi.alles@live.at {{summoner:31}}

Once per server!

Yes it works. I would love one, but by the time i see it somebody will prob snatch it anyway
Yup, they work once for each server, I've come across a lot of codes "already used on EUW"... I play on EUW, so if you or anyone else is willing to share them, i'd appreciate it
Yes, you can use a code once per server. Which is why a lot of people will give the codes away after using them on their own servers.
